titles.title: Providing for consideration of the conference report to accompany the concurrent resolution (S. Con. Res. 21) setting forth the congressional budget for the United States Government for fiscal year 2008 and including the appropriate budgetary levels for fiscal years 2007 and 2009 through 2012.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-156, by Ms. Sutton.
All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered as read and shall be debatable for one hour.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 63.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 409.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 224 - 193 (Roll no. 375).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 225 - 194 (Roll no. 376).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/17/2007--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the conference report on S.Con.Res. 21 (congressional budget).
